title: Sonic.And.All.Stars.Racing.Transformed.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Sonic.And.All.Stars.Racing.Transformed.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Year: 2013
Genre: Arcade / Racing (Futuristic) / 3D
Developer: Sumo Digital
Publisher: SEGA
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: ALI213



System requirements:  
=====================================

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with DirectX 9 shaders third model
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard drive: 6 GB

Game information:  
===================================

Famous Sonic has no equal in speed. But in Sonic & All-Star Racing
Transformed he will make every effort to prove it, because the track
goes all-star cast of heroes gaming company Sega.
Hone skills rider - get your hands drifting, afterburner and aerobatics.
And do not forget about the weapons and superpowers. To reach the
finish line first, all good!
But keep in mind, you should be wary of not only other riders. The circuit
itself is not just surprise you during the race: the road will be destroyed,
waters dry up, and the new track sections may arise where a second
ago it was impossible to pass.
Come to the aid of fireballs amazing ability to adapt to the landscape -
at the request of the pilot, he becomes a boat on the water, the aircraft
in the air and the machine on the ground. Search for all the alternative
ways to go to the track ideal trajectory and cross the finish line first!

Game Features:  
===================================

You will most unusual race. Each participant - a unique car, which
at the request of the pilot can be converted into a car, boat or plane.
By managing each form requires a different approach, and to succeed
will have to master them all.

In the star of the Sonic & All-Star Racing Transformed includes over
two dozen well-known heroes. Where else can you see how on one
track converge blue hedgehog, monkey, pirate and a dwarf with a huge ax?

The race continues on the ground, in water and in the air for 16 dynamically
changing routes, decorated in the style of famous games SEGA. Look for
workarounds, collect bonuses and avoid dangers - the only way to
achieve victory.

At your disposal - a vast arsenal of devastating weapons. However, you have
to try and learn to aim, shoot, dodge and block attacks opponents. The game
was a place of special moves, which are now even better than before.

Repack Features:  
=====================================

Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
Version of the game - v1.0up6fix
Do not recoded
Cut titles developers (Credits)
Additions:
Transformed: Metal Sonic & Outrun;
Yogscast;
Ryo Hazuki
